SELECT A.USER_EX_NUM, A.`STATUS`, A.CREATE_TIME, B.EX_POTION_NAME, B.EX_POTION_RARE_CODE, B.EX_VALUE, C.USER_NAME FROM GM_USER_EXPERIENCE_POTION A LEFT JOIN GM_EXPERIENCE_POTION B ON A.GM_EX_POTION_ID = B.GM_EX_POTION_ID LEFT JOIN GM_USER C ON A.GM_USER_ID = C.USER_ID
${ew.customSqlSegment} GROUP BY A.USER_EX_NUM , A.`STATUS` , A.CREATE_TIME , B.EX_POTION_NAME, B.EX_POTION_RARE_CODE, B.EX_VALUE, C.USER_NAME ORDER BY A.CREATE_TIME DESC,A.`STATUS` DESC
